services:.subtitle: SERVICES
services:.title: Offering high quality services for projects that want to grow.

final_action.caption: Still unsure what your company needs?

service::0.title: Website Development
service::0.description: Developing a website front-end and back-end, creating web pages, blogs, catalogs, and any type of web resource, with a strong care for performance and user experience.
service::0.is_for_me: Good tool for a company that values their marketing, having a professional display of their services and products online, with strong digital marketing resources such as a blog and contact forms.

service::1.title: Web Design
service::1.description: Creating a prototype for a website, in its desktop and mobile versions, and designing the User Experience of the website.
service::1.is_for_me:
Useful resource for companies that are looking to use their website to sell, convert and grow authority.
Remarkable websites make remarkable companies.

service::2.title: Website Maintenance Plans
service::2.description: Taking care of keeping the website always updated and in good shape.
service::2.is_for_me: Taking care of keeping the website always updated and in good shape.

service::3.title: Branding & Visual Id
service::3.description: Offering a specialized input for existing brands and developing new brands and visual identities from scratch.
service::3.is_for_me: A good asset for projects looking for a strong brand concept and professional visual resources to start up their marketing efforts.
